channel.title: [question]How do i make that you have to register before playing? [question]
channel.description:
How do i make that you have to register before playing? I have searched at google, didnt find anything, i browsed the Tutorials section didnt find anything! Please help! :D
[quote="_Vengeance"]You don't even have to use MySQL, it's just a better alternative that allows you to run the server off the same DB remotely..[/quote] Okay, but can ihave help how i do it ;D
- Chrham 2
